name: reactive-resume
description: Reactive Resume is a self-hosted resume builder that allows users to design and export resumes easily using templates. It emphasizes privacy and modern UI with support for multiple languages.
features: Template library: Choose from multiple professional resume layouts optimized for different industries.
Real-time preview: See changes instantly as you edit your resume content and formatting.
Multi-format export: Download resumes as PDF, JSON, or print-ready formats for various applications.
Privacy focused: Keep all resume data on your own server without sharing with third-party services.
Section customization: Add, remove, or reorder resume sections to match your experience and goals.
Multi-language support: Create resumes in different languages with proper formatting and character support.
Color schemes: Customize colors and fonts to match your personal brand or industry standards.
Import existing resumes: Upload JSON files to continue editing resumes created elsewhere.
Responsive design: Edit resumes comfortably on desktop, tablet, or mobile devices.
Version history: Track changes and revert to previous versions of your resume.
Multiple resumes: Maintain separate resumes for different job applications or career paths.
Open source: Modify and extend the platform to add custom features or integrations.
